metadata.description: Platform services matrix with sub-product granularity

scp.display_name: Demand, D360, Fulfilment, ESP, IO, OO, OP

platform_services.name: Access Management - Authentication
platform_services.description: Single sign-on through Platform

platform_services.name: Access Management - Authorization
platform_services.description: User access to capabilities and data controlled by Platform (RBAC - Role Based Access Control)

platform_services.name: API Management
platform_services.description: APIs available via the Platform API catalog

platform_services.name: Runtime Environment
platform_services.description: Platform framework for executing processes (serverless computing, Azure services)

platform_services.name: User Experience (Portal)
platform_services.description: User interface using Platform UI components

platform_services.name: Application Lifecycle Management
platform_services.description: Version control of code and configurations. Promoting {code, configuration} from DEV -> TEST -> PROD

platform_services.name: Automated Environment Provisioning
platform_services.description: Provisioning of new environments for single-tenant solutions. Provisioning of new realms for all solutions.

platform_services.name: Workflow Orchestrator
platform_services.description: Ability to create a sequence of automated actions to perform a task or support a process.

platform_services.name: Business Data Management
platform_services.description: Used to view and edit data in Platform data cloud.

platform_services.name: Blue Yonder Data Share App
platform_services.description: Snowflake data sharing for ingestion.

platform_services.name: Bulk Ingestion
platform_services.description: Data ingestion via API or file transfer using CSV format data.

platform_services.name: Bulk Distribution
platform_services.description: Transfer of data from Platform data cloud to an application specific data store.

platform_services.name: Curated Data
platform_services.description: The product uses the curated data as its primary source or as it's inbound reference source.

platform_services.name: Streaming Ingestion
platform_services.description: Data ingestion via API in near real-time using JSON format data.

platform_services.name: Streaming Distribution
platform_services.description: Transfer of data from Platform data cloud to an application specific data store in near real-time.

platform_services.name: DaaS - Egress
platform_services.description: Export to Blob Store: Export data to BY Azure blob storage Snowflake data share to same Azure region

platform_services.name: DaaS - Snowflake share cross cloud/region
platform_services.description: Snowflake data share to a different Cloud provider i.e. AWS, GCP Snowflake data share to a different Microsoft Azure region

platform_services.name: DaaS - Reader account
platform_services.description: Enbles customers to have direct access to Platform data cloud for reading data.

platform_services.name: DaaS - Archive
platform_services.description: Enbles data archival, backup and purge

platform_services.name: ML Studio
platform_services.description: Automated ML ops pipeline for use with Products leveraging the data cloud
